data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rankin, Dana L., Messing, Charles G. (2008): A revision of the comatulid genus Stephanometra AH Clark with a rediagnosis of the genus Lamprometra AH Clark (Echinodermata: Crinoidea). Zootaxa 1888: 1-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184295
